body: Using open data in agriculture can help make processes more efficient, target decision making and promote collaboration. In this module, we look at what open data is and how it can benefit the agricultural sector, with examples of where open data is already being used.
title: Open Data and Agriculture

_skills.outcome: Describe the benefits of open data for agriculture
Explain case studies of open data and agriculture in the Caribbean

body: Agribusiness - the business of agriculture - encompasses all activities from 'pre-farm' to fork. It boosts the economy, contributes to domestic food supply and provides employment. In this module, we look at the sectors of agribusiness, why it is essential to the Caribbean and trends to watch.
title: Agribusiness

_skills.outcome: Describe the three sectors of agribusiness
Explain why agribusiness is essential to the Caribbean
List trends to watch in agribusiness

body: eLearning helps you reach people that you would never be able to reach in a classroom alone. This module introduces what you need to know to start writing engaging eLearning.
title: Writing eLearning

body:
Adapt eLearning is a multi-award winning tool for developing engaging and advanced eLearning.

In this module we explore how an Adapt eLearning page is structured and how you can develop engaging eLearning using the tool.
title: Getting started with Adapt eLearning

_skills.outcome: Describe the structure and components of a course created in Adapt
Use theme to improve the visual look of a course
Analyse where plugins can be used to improve a course
